rules_text:
Sacrifice a creature: Kass gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X was that creature's power. If that creature was a Minion, put X +1/+1 counters on Kass instead. Activate only as a sorcery.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2: When Dozens of Minions dies, create A Handful of Minions, a 2/1 black Minion creature token with “When this creature dies, create a 1/1 black Minion creature token.”
